name: file-switcher
description: This VS Code extension allows you to switch between open files using the "Alt + X" shortcut, similar to the "Alt + Tab" functionality on Windows. Each time you press "Alt + X," it cycles to the next open file and displays it in preview mode in the active editor, allowing for quick file navigation within your project.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
